channel.title: Asset Management on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Asset Management on FinanClub

item.title: ITUB
item.description: score:168 Chances: Itau Unibanco benefits from steady growth in asset management and credit operations. Increased operating revenues and managerial financial margin are partially offset by escalating costs for Itau Unibanco in the fourth quarter of 2023. The bank also operates the fifth-largest insurer in Brazil and is the second-largest asset manager in the country, giving it broad reach over the Brazilian financial system.

item.title: IVZ
item.description: score:-36 Chances: Invesco Ltd. continues to demonstrate its commitment to providing a better investment experience for its clients by implementing changes to its ETFs. The company is set to release its fourth quarter 2023 results, signaling transparency and accountability to its investors. Invesco’s position in the market may improve as the company explores the potential for launching exchange traded funds tied to the spot price of bitcoin.
